name: part_003
file: tmp_【#白銀ノエル生誕祭2024】Shirogane Noel Xmas 3D LIVE 【白銀ノエル⧸ホロライブ】 [fTupWAFy6wo]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_003.mov

scenes.description: Continuation of the performance of 'When the First Love Ends' featuring Noel, Kanade, and Ririka.
scenes.song_name: 初めての恋が終わる時

scenes.description: MC segment where Kanade and Ririka congratulate Noel on her anniversary and discuss being guests on a 3D live for the first time.

subtitles.original: 前から決めていた事だから これでいいの
subtitles.english: Because I had decided this long ago, this is fine.

subtitles.original: 振り向かないから
subtitles.english: Because I won't look back.

subtitles.original: ありがとう サヨナラ 切ない片想い
subtitles.english: Thank you, goodbye, painful unrequited love.

subtitles.original: 足を止めたら思い出してしまう だから
subtitles.english: If I stop walking, I'll end up remembering, so...

subtitles.original: ありがとう サヨナラ 泣いたりしないから
subtitles.english: Thank you, goodbye, because I won't cry.

subtitles.original: そう思った途端に ふわり
subtitles.english: Just as I thought that, softly...

subtitles.original: 舞い降りてくる雪 触れたら溶けて消えた
subtitles.english: The falling snow, when touched, it melted and vanished.

subtitles.original: 駅へと続く大通り 寄り添ってる二人
subtitles.english: On the main street leading to the station, a couple huddles together.

subtitles.original: 「ほら見て 初雪」
subtitles.english: "Look, the first snow."

subtitles.original: キミとあんな風になりたくて
subtitles.english: I wanted to be like that with you.

subtitles.original: 初めて作った手編みのマフラー
subtitles.english: The first hand-knitted muffler I ever made.

subtitles.original: どうしたら渡せたんだろう 意気地なし 怖かっただけ
subtitles.english: How could I have given it to you? No courage, I was just scared.

subtitles.original: 思い出になるなら このままで構わないって
subtitles.english: If it's to become a memory, I don't mind staying like this.

subtitles.original: それは本当なの？
subtitles.english: Is that really true?

subtitles.original: ありがとう サヨナラ いつかこんな時が来てしまうこと
subtitles.english: Thank you, goodbye, that a time like this would come one day...

subtitles.original: わかってたはずだわ なのに
subtitles.english: I should have known, and yet...

subtitles.original: ありがとう サヨナラ 体が震えてる
subtitles.english: Thank you, goodbye, my body is shaking.

subtitles.original: もうすぐ列車が来るのに
subtitles.english: Even though the train is coming soon.

subtitles.original: それは今になって 私を苦しめる
subtitles.english: That now makes me suffer.

subtitles.original: 繋がりたい どれほど願っただろう
subtitles.english: I want to be connected, how much I wished for it.

subtitles.original: この手は空っぽ
subtitles.english: These hands are empty.

subtitles.original: ねえ サヨナラってこういうこと？
subtitles.english: Hey, is this what "goodbye" means?

subtitles.original: 行かなくちゃ そんなのわかってる
subtitles.english: I have to go, I know that.

subtitles.original: キミが優しい事も知ってる だから
subtitles.english: I know you're kind, so...

subtitles.original: 行かなくちゃ そんなのわかってる
subtitles.english: I have to go, I know that.

subtitles.original: キミが優しい事も知ってる だから
subtitles.english: I know you're kind, so...

subtitles.original: 「この手を離してよ」
subtitles.english: "Let go of this hand."

subtitles.original: 出会えてよかった キミが好き
subtitles.english: I'm glad we met, I love you.

subtitles.original: ありがとう サヨナラ 言葉が言えない
subtitles.english: Thank you, goodbye, I can't say a word.

subtitles.original: 今だけでいい 私に勇気を
subtitles.english: Just for now is fine, give me courage.

subtitles.original: あのね 言いかけた唇 キミとの距離は０
subtitles.english: You see... the lips that were about to speak, the distance to you is zero.

subtitles.original: 今だけは泣いていいよね
subtitles.english: It's okay to cry just for now, right?

subtitles.original: もう言葉はいらない お願いぎゅっとしていて
subtitles.english: I don't need words anymore. Please, hold me tight.

subtitles.original: 来年の今頃には
subtitles.english: Around this time next year,

subtitles.original: どんな私が居て
subtitles.english: what kind of person will I be,

subtitles.original: どんなキミがいるのかな
subtitles.english: and what kind of person will you be?

subtitles.original: 先輩！
subtitles.english: Senpai!

subtitles.original: おめでとうございます！
subtitles.english: Congratulations!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！すごーい！
subtitles.english: Yay! Amazing!

subtitles.original: なんか出たよ！クラッカー！
subtitles.english: Something came out! Crackers!

subtitles.original: クラッカーはい、用意してきました！
subtitles.english: Crackers, yes, we prepared them!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございました！
subtitles.english: Thank you very much!

subtitles.original: あわじゃあわじゃ...
subtitles.english: (Flustered noises)

subtitles.original: 今回はクリスマス会に来ていただきありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you for coming to the Christmas party today!

subtitles.original: ありがとうございます！
subtitles.english: Thank you!

subtitles.original: メリークリスマス！
subtitles.english: Merry Christmas!

subtitles.original: なんか召喚の儀みたいになってますけど...
subtitles.english: It looks like some kind of summoning ritual...

subtitles.original: いやあ、お二人は...
subtitles.english: Well, you two...

subtitles.original: え、もしかなんですけど、3Dね...
subtitles.english: Well, maybe... you recently got your 3D models,

subtitles.original: 最近なったじゃないですか。そこから...
subtitles.english: right? Since then,

subtitles.original: 先輩のゲストとかってあったり？
subtitles.english: have you been a guest for a senpai before?

subtitles.original: 実は...
subtitles.english: Actually...

subtitles.original: 初めてです！
subtitles.english: it's our first time!

subtitles.original: イエーイ！
subtitles.english: Yay!

subtitles.original: 初めてでーす！
subtitles.english: It's the first time!
